mapper.select: select user_id, user_nickname, promotion_board_id, promotion_board_title, file_system_name, food_sum from view_promotion_all order by food_sum desc limit 0, 10
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_promotion_board (promotion_board_title, promotion_board_contents, promotion_board_register_date, promotion_board_update_date, user_id, promotion_board_read_count) values (#{promotionBoardTitle}, #{promotionBoardContents}, now(), now(), #{userId}, 0)
